name: Arkbomb: Pinballrkanoid
description:
INTRODUCTION

Hello Everyone!

We are CyberLab Studios, at our sixth Ludum Dare togheter! 

Today we present you a simple game, we are very busy working for different commercial projects, 

but wanted to partecipate anyway for this special occasion, it's LD 50! 20 years of this amazing jam that unite us all!

GAMEPLAY

Arkbomb: Pinballrkanoid is a mix between pinball and classic arkanoid, with a little twist to fit the theme: the pinball is actually a bomb, it has a timer, hitting the bricks will delay the explosion, when you finish the bricks you can refill them hitting the spot indicated on the board!

This game features an online Leaderboard! Let's see who can beat our highscores, tough the game is a bit difficult and can be a little frustrating, sorry, little time to balance it and polish it, hope you enjoy anyway!

CONTROLS

A D to move the stick

SPACEBAR to hit the ball

CREDITS

Andrea Di Bartolo 3d Art - 2d Art - Game Design

Samuele Padalino  Code - Ui - Game Design

 Music and Sound effects are from [www.zapsplat.com](www.zapsplat.com) and Mezhdunami from Pixabay
